verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

נָשֹׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> na-So, Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> roSh the sum בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons קְהָ֔ת <S%H6955><s%> ke-Hat, of Kohath מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons לֵוִ֑י <S%H3881><s%> le-Vi; Leviite לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam. of their fathers

מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim From thirty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah, and upward וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad against בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim even until fifty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בָּא֙ <S%H935><s%> ba all that enter לַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> latz-tza-Va, into the host לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah the work בְּאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat This [shall be] the service בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the sons קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> ke-Hat of Kohath בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh [about] the most הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-da-Shim. holy things

וּבָ֨א <S%H935><s%> u-Va shall come אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav and his sons בִּנְסֹ֣עַ <S%H5265><s%> bin-So-a' setteth forward הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, And when the camp וְהוֹרִ֕דוּ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ho-Ri-du and they shall take down אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et פָּרֹ֣כֶת <S%H6532><s%> pa-Ro-chet vail הַמָּסָ֑ךְ <S%H4539><s%> ham-ma-Sach; the covering וְכִ֨סּוּ־ <S%H3680><s%> ve-Chis-su- and cover בָ֔הּ Vah, אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲרֹ֥ן <S%H727><s%> 'a-Ron the ark הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut. of testimony

וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu And shall put עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, and כְּסוּי֙ <S%H3681><s%> ke-Sui thereon the covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or skins תַּ֔חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> Ta-chash, of badgers' וּפָרְשׂ֧וּ <S%H6566><s%> u-fa-re-Su and shall spread בֶֽגֶד־ <S%H899><s%> ve-ged- [it] a cloth כְּלִ֛יל <S%H3632><s%> ke-Lil wholly תְּכֵ֖לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let of blue מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> mil-Ma-'e-lah; over וְשָׂמ֖וּ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sa-Mu and shall put בַּדָּֽיו׃ <S%H905><s%> bad-Dav. in the staves

וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al Over שֻׁלְחַ֣ן <S%H7979><s%> shul-Chan And upon the table הַפָּנִ֗ים <S%H6440><s%> hap-pa-Nim, of shewbread יִפְרְשׂוּ֮ <S%H6566><s%> yif-re-Su they shall spread בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> Be-ged a cloth תְּכֵלֶת֒ <S%H8504><s%> te-che-Let of blue וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu and put עָ֠לָיו <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lav Over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקְּעָרֹ֤ת <S%H7086><s%> hak-ke-'a-Rot thereon the dishes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכַּפֹּת֙ <S%H3709><s%> hak-kap-Pot and the spoons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמְּנַקִּיֹּ֔ת <S%H4518><s%> ham-me-nak-ki-Yot, and the bowls וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et קְשׂ֣וֹת <S%H7184><s%> ke-Sot and covers הַנָּ֑סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> han-Na-sech; to cover withal וְלֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> ve-Le-chem bread הַתָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid and the continual עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav Over יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. become

וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <S%H6566><s%> u-fa-re-Su And they shall spread עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, over בֶּ֚גֶד <S%H899><s%> Be-ged upon them a cloth תּוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni, of scarlet וְכִסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> ve-chis-Su and cover אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <S%H4372><s%> be-mich-Seh the same with a covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> Ta-chash; of badgers' וְשָׂמ֖וּ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sa-Mu and shall put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בַּדָּֽיו׃ <S%H905><s%> bad-Dav. in the staves

וְלָקְח֣וּ׀ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-ke-Chu And they shall take בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> Be-ged a cloth תְּכֵ֗לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let, of blue וְכִסּ֞וּ <S%H3680><s%> ve-chis-Su and cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְנֹרַ֤ת <S%H4501><s%> me-no-Rat the candlestick הַמָּאוֹר֙ <S%H3974><s%> ham-ma-'Or of the light וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et נֵ֣רֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5216><s%> ne-ro-Tei-ha, and his lamps וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַלְקָחֶ֖יהָ <S%H4457><s%> mal-ka-Chei-ha and his tongs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַחְתֹּתֶ֑יהָ <S%H4289><s%> mach-to-Tei-ha; and his snuffdishes וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei vessels שַׁמְנָ֔הּ <S%H8081><s%> sham-Nah, and all the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְשָׁרְתוּ־ <S%H8334><s%> ye-sha-re-tu- thereof wherewith they minister לָ֖הּ lah בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וְנָתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu And they shall put אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all כֵּלֶ֔יהָ <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei-ha, it and all the vessels אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in מִכְסֵ֖ה <S%H4372><s%> mich-Seh thereof within a covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> Ta-chash; of badgers' וְנָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu and shall put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4132><s%> ham-Mot. [it] upon a bar

וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al Over מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach altar הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav, And upon the golden יִפְרְשׂוּ֙ <S%H6566><s%> yif-re-Su they shall spread בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> Be-ged a cloth תְּכֵ֔לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let, of blue וְכִסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> ve-chis-Su and cover אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <S%H4372><s%> be-mich-Seh it with a covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> Ta-chash; of badgers' וְשָׂמ֖וּ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sa-Mu and shall put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בַּדָּֽיו׃ <S%H905><s%> bad-Dav. to the staves

וְלָקְחוּ֩ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-ke-Chu And they shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כְּלֵ֨י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei all the instruments הַשָּׁרֵ֜ת <S%H8335><s%> hash-sha-Ret of ministry אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְשָֽׁרְתוּ־ <S%H8334><s%> ye-sha-re-tu- wherewith they minister בָ֣ם vam בַּקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> bak-Ko-desh, in the sanctuary וְנָֽתְנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu and put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> Be-ged [them] in a cloth תְּכֵ֔לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let, of blue וְכִסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> ve-chis-Su and cover אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <S%H4372><s%> be-mich-Seh them with a covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> Ta-chash; of badgers' וְנָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu and shall put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4132><s%> ham-Mot. [them] on a bar

וְדִשְּׁנ֖וּ <S%H1878><s%> ve-dish-she-Nu And they shall take away the ashes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; from the altar וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <S%H6566><s%> u-fa-re-Su and spread עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, over בֶּ֖גֶד <S%H899><s%> Be-ged cloth אַרְגָּמָֽן׃ <S%H713><s%> 'ar-ga-Man. a purple

וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-te-Nu And they shall put עָ֠לָיו <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lav connection אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כֵּלָ֞יו <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lav upon it all the vessels אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְֽשָׁרְת֧וּ <S%H8334><s%> ye-sha-re-Tu thereof wherewith they minister עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over בָּהֶ֗ם ba-Hem, אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּחְתֹּ֤ת <S%H4289><s%> ham-mach-Tot about it [even] the censers אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְלָגֹת֙ <S%H4207><s%> ham-miz-la-Got the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיָּעִ֣ים <S%H3257><s%> hai-ya-'Im and the shovels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת <S%H4219><s%> ham-miz-ra-Kot, and the basons כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei all the vessels הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; of the altar וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <S%H6566><s%> u-fa-re-Su and they shall spread עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, over כְּס֛וּי <S%H3681><s%> ke-Sui upon it a covering ע֥וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or skins תַּ֖חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> Ta-chash of badgers' וְשָׂמ֥וּ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sa-Mu and put בַדָּֽיו׃ <S%H905><s%> vad-Dav. to the staves

וְכִלָּ֣ה <S%H3615><s%> ve-chil-Lah have made an end אַֽהֲרֹן־ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-ron- And when Aaron וּ֠בָנָיו <S%H1121><s%> U-va-nav and his sons לְכַסֹּ֨ת <S%H3680><s%> le-chas-Sot of covering אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh the sanctuary וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei and all the vessels הַקֹּדֶשׁ֮ <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-Desh of the sanctuary בִּנְסֹ֣עַ <S%H5265><s%> bin-So-a' is to set forward הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֒ <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh as the camp וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-rei- after כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Chen, after that יָבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u shall come בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- that the sons קְהָת֙ <S%H6955><s%> ke-Hat of Kohath לָשֵׂ֔את <S%H5375><s%> la-Set, to bear וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- they will not יִגְּע֥וּ <S%H5060><s%> yig-ge-'U [it] but they shall not touch אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh [any] holy thing וָמֵ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> va-Me-tu; lest they die אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These מַשָּׂ֥א <S%H4853><s%> mas-Sa These [things are] the burden בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the sons קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> ke-Hat of Kohath בְּאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וּפְקֻדַּ֞ת <S%H6486><s%> u-fe-kud-Dat And to the office אֶלְעָזָ֣ר׀ <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar of Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest שֶׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men [pertaineth] the oil הַמָּאוֹר֙ <S%H3974><s%> ham-ma-'Or for the light וּקְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> u-ke-To-ret incense הַסַּמִּ֔ים <S%H5561><s%> has-sam-Mim, and the sweet וּמִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> u-min-Chat meat offering הַתָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid and the daily וְשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ve-She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֑ה <S%H4888><s%> ham-mish-Chah; and the anointing פְּקֻדַּ֗ת <S%H6486><s%> pe-kud-Dat, [and] the oversight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan of all the tabernacle וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after בּ֔וֹ bo, בְּקֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> be-Ko-desh and of all that therein [is] in the sanctuary וּבְכֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H3627><s%> u-ve-che-Lav. and in the vessels ס sa-Mek

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying
